content.raw:
I came across some strange behavior running this. It is probably not a big deal and may not be in the scope of this PR. I have not looked into the source code, so I am not sure if this is expected behavior on startup or if it needs to be fixed, as it seems to go away quite quickly.

**Description**:

Upon startup of the simulation, the images on the docks start both as blue circles, which is not what it should be. Then after a moment, it changes to the correct \(red circle and blue circle\) or \(red circle and red cross\).

**How to recreate**:

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo scan_and_dock_a.launch` then quickly move camera to the dock to see the images. It happens when I run `a` then close then run `b`. It also happens if I repeatedly run `a` and then `a` again.
